UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: N-terminus three residues deletion mutant of human beta-defensin 3 with remarkably enhanced salt-resistance.
Literature.Author: Li T, Guo F, Wang Q, Fang H, Li Z, Wang D, Wang H
